resources.string:
HAP Viewer for Android 

Support for parsing OpenHarmony, HarmonyOS API 9+ (Stage model) application installation packages, support for running on Android devices with Android 7+ 

Version：%1$s 
Open Source：%2$s 
License：Apache 2.0 
Contributors：westinyang、Jesse205 
QQ Group：752399947
Press the back button again to exit.
Hap file parsing failed, currently only supports parsing API 9+ (Stage model) application installers.
Wrong file type, please select a hap file.

Installation of HAP requires the support of the operating system and must have the correct signature, so packages you download from unofficial application markets will most likely not install. For unknown reasons, it is not possible to determine whether the installation of the software was successful or not, so the software will always display \"Installation finished\".
We need %1$s to ensure that we can %2$s. %3$s
If you do not grant this permission, the file will be copied to the private space before being read.
